sqlMap.select: select count(*) from PROJECT_STANDARD t_s where 1=1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS NUMROW, p.* from ( select t_s.ID, t_s.PRO_TYPE_CODE, t_s.NAME, t_s.CONTENT, t_s.ENABLE, t_s.GMT_CREATE, t_s.GMT_MODIFY, t_s.OPERATOR ,t_pt.name as project_type_name from PROJECT_STANDARD t_s, project_type t_pt where t_s.pro_type_code=t_pt.code
order by t_s.GMT_CREATE ) p where rownum<=#endIndex#) WHERE NUMROW >= #beginIndex#
select ID, PRO_TYPE_CODE, NAME, CONTENT, ENABLE, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFY, OPERATOR from PROJECT_STANDARD order by GMT_CREATE

select t_s.ID, t_s.PRO_TYPE_CODE, t_s.NAME, t_s.CONTENT, t_s.ENABLE, t_s.GMT_CREATE, t_s.GMT_MODIFY, t_s.OPERATOR ,t_pt.name from PROJECT_STANDARD t_s, project_type t_pt where t_s.ID = #id:DECIMAL# and t_s.pro_type_code=t_pt.code

select ID, PRO_TYPE_CODE, PRO_TYPE_CODE NAME, CONTENT, ENABLE, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFY, OPERATOR from PROJECT_STANDARD t_s where t_s.PRO_TYPE_CODE = #proTypeCode:VARCHAR#
t_s.NAME = #name:VARCHAR#
t_s.ID != #id:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into PROJECT_STANDARD (ID, PRO_TYPE_CODE, NAME, ENABLE, GMT_CREATE, GMT_MODIFY, OPERATOR, CONTENT) values (SEQ_PROJECT_STANDARD.NextVal, #proTypeCode:VARCHAR#, #name:VARCHAR#, #enable:CHAR#, sysdate, sysdate, #operator:VARCHAR#, #content:CLOB#)
sqlMap.update:
update PROJECT_STANDARD set PRO_TYPE_CODE = #proTypeCode:VARCHAR#, NAME = #name:VARCHAR#, ENABLE = #enable:CHAR#,
GMT_MODIFY = sysdate, OPERATOR = #operator:VARCHAR#, CONTENT = #content:CLOB# where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
update PROJECT_STANDARD t_s set t_s.ENABLE = #enable:CHAR# where ID = #id:DECIMAL#
